main event: A bright white light, bearing 210° W, was observed to be stationary with occasional flashes. Another object, bearing 212° W, was also observed to be stationary.
interesting points: The sighting was reported as a 'usual' type of observation.
The sighting was reported as a ground-visual observation.
The second object was described as a 'silvery, round, stationary object'.
The conclusion stated that there was 'insufficient data included for evaluation'.
sighted object: bright white light, silvery round object
